 2010-01312010-02-09,  ,  ,  ,  DFAIT
SubjectAgreement between the Government of Canada and the Government of the United States of America on Government Procurement
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs: (a)(i) to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, the Agreement between the Government of Canada and the Government of the United States of America on GOVERNMENT PROCUREMENT, or (a)(ii) to execute and issue an Instrument of Full Powers authorizing Peter Van Loan, Minister for Foreign Trade, or Gary Doer, Ambassador of Canada to the United States of America, or Louis LÃ©vesque, Deputy Minister of International Trade, to sign; b) to take the necessary action to bring the Agreement into force for Canada.
AttachmentsAttachment
